mapper.select: SELECT A.SNSBOARD_SEQ AS snsboardSeq , A.SNSBOARD_SUBJECT AS snsboardSubject, A.SNSBOARD_REGDATE AS snsboardRegdate, A.USER_EMAIL_ID_FK AS userEmailIdFk, A.SNSBOARD_BLIND AS snsboardBlind,A.SNSBOARD_STAT AS snsboardStat, B.UNIVERSITY_NAME AS universityName FROM SNSBOARD A INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY B ON A.UNIVERSITY_SEQ = B.UNIVERSITY_SEQ ${whereWord} ORDER BY SNSBOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10
